mapper.select: SELECT n.note_id FROM tb_note n WHERE n.user_id = #{userid} AND n.note_root = '1'
SELECT n.note_path FROM tb_note n WHERE n.note_id = #{parentid}
SELECT * FROM tb_note n WHERE n.user_id = #{userid} AND n.note_type = '1' AND n.note_status = '1' ORDER BY n.note_modify_time DESC limit 0,10
SELECT * FROM tb_note n WHERE n.user_id = #{userid} AND n.note_type = '1' AND n.note_status = '1' AND n.note_modify_time = (SELECT MAX(t.note_modify_time+0) FROM tb_note t)
SELECT * FROM tb_note n WHERE n.user_id = #{userid} AND n.note_parent = #{noteparent} AND n.note_status = '1' AND n.note_root = '0' ORDER BY n.note_modify_time DESC
SELECT * FROM tb_note n WHERE n.user_id = #{userid} AND n.note_id LIKE #{noteparent}
